sentences.en: At this point, employees wondered why we were keeping such rebellious boy.
sentences.cn: 正是因为以上的种种,他四年前的这些话一点都不令人惊讶.

sentences.en: From childhood, he was evidently at once rebellious and precocious.
sentences.cn: 从儿时起，他就明显地既叛逆又早熟。

sentences.en: He grew older and more rebellious.
sentences.cn: 他长大了，也越发叛逆了。

sentences.en: He has always had a rebellious streak .
He's a subversive infidel rebellious alike against his God and his king.
sentences.cn: 他是反叛上帝又反叛君主的专搞颠覆的异教徒.

sentences.en: He’s always had a rebellious streak (= a tendency to rebel ) .
Her reply was mild enough, but her thoughts were rebellious.
sentences.cn: 她的回答虽然很温和, 但她的心里十分反感.

sentences.en: I would feel rebellious against all life.
sentences.cn: 我觉得对所有的生活都有一种反抗的情绪.

sentences.en: It has been a triple error, he has been contradictory, rebellious and facetious.
sentences.cn: 这话有三错: 他自相矛盾! 离经叛道!哗众取宠!

sentences.en: It'served to make him rebellious and hence lethargic at times.
sentences.cn: 这种情况引起他对现状的反抗心理,有时候便老是没精打采.

sentences.en: On June 25, it got fussy, rebellious, selfish, ego - driven fat cat Garfield.
sentences.cn: 到了6月25号, 好莱坞看上了神经质 、 逆 、 私 、 自我 为中心的大胖猫——加菲.

sentences.en: Probably his wild gesticulations and his generally excited and rebellious manner gave rise to this supposition.
sentences.cn: 大概是他那种粗野的手势以及经常激动和不信邪的态度使人家产生了这种怀疑.

sentences.en: She then became rebellious during her teens and drank, smoked, and shoplifted.
sentences.cn: 青春期又叛逆地走上歧路,喝酒 、 抽菸 、 偷窃样样来.

sentences.en: Silver was the captain, and a mighty rebellious crew he had of it.
sentences.cn: 希尔弗才是真正的船长, 而且拥有一帮蠢蠢欲动的手下.

sentences.en: The rebellious dragon was quite humbled and subdued, and became a most creditable younger brother.
sentences.cn: 这个当年强头蹶脑的骑兵现在变得低心小胆, 成了个很不错的弟弟了.

sentences.en: The tribesmen were as rebellious as ever.
sentences.cn: 这个部落仍旧有反叛的倾向.
